definitions.definition: The property of being effective , of achieving results.
examples: The effectiveness of the drug was well established.

definitions.definition: The capacity or potential for achieving results.
The degree to which something achieves results.
examples: He questioned the effectiveness of the treatment.

main_definition: The property of being effective , of achieving results.
secondary_definitions: The capacity or potential for achieving results.
The degree to which something achieves results.
